name: One Tower To Roll Them All
name_original: One Tower To Roll Them All
description:
Controls

Just left click to interact with your dice and tower!

Build One Tower To Roll Them All!!

- Use dice to upgrade your towers stats

- Fight off waves of ever increasing enemies

- Upgrading different stats allows for unique builds

My friend and I built this game in less than a day for the GMTK Game Jam!!

We hope you enjoy playing!
